name: Westset Logistics
description:
Guy Dominguez joined his father in 1996. He started as warehouse manager and as the business expanded with sustaining customers such as Redbull, he felt that relying on another third party logistic partner was not an ideal way of reassuring clients of what he deems as quality service. It was Guy who formed Westset Logistics, a third party logistics company (3PL), dedicated to provide both storage and materials handling.
He has an extremely hands on approach in managing inventory both inbound and outbound for Westsetâ€™s clients. Each client has a unique set up with a different range of products. Each one gets a customized program, with logistics and warehousing solutions all monitored in real time. Whilst micro managing each moving item can be tedious for some, Westset has mastered the details and the art of maintaining inventory and materials handling accuracy.
